title: Impact of Indonesia's Forest Management Units on the reduction of forest loss and forest fires in Sulawesi
content:
Publication date: January 2025

Source: Ecological Economics, Volume 227

Author(s): Colas Chervier, Stibniati S. Atmadja, Sandy Nofyanza, Annisa Choiriatun Nur, Fitri Nurfatriani, Rochadi Kristiningrum, Muhammad Alif K. Sahide, Ali Suhardiman, Syukur Umar
